About¶

Authors¶

articubench was mainly developed by Konstantin Sering and Paul Schmidt-Barbo, For the full list of contributors have a look at Github’s Contributor summary.

Currently, it is maintained by Konstantin Sering and Paul Schmidt-Barbo.

Contact¶

In case you want to contact the project maintainers, please send an email to

konstantin [dot] sering [at] uni [minus] tuebingen [dot] de
